segments.text: Looking in, I see the everyday bustle of a kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is focused on drying that plate, towel wrapped around it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the faucet is filling the sink and spilling out uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming this sad little puddle that's soaking everything nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in it, and she doesn't even flinchâ€”poor thing, so unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel for her; she's missing the trouble right at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy over there is climbing the stool to the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand inside, grabbing cookies like it's a treasure hunt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up too, her face full of anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look so innocent in their mischief, but that stool wobbles terribly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One fall could hurt them badly, and it breaks my heart thinking about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a pretty garden, a bright spot in this tense moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope nothing bad happens to interrupt their fun.
segments.speaker: PAR
